game.name: Magic Exposure 2 – Yuri Visual Novel
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: After breaking up with Erika, Bianca's life unravels once more when a second magic camera appears and a new girl, Lúcia, enters the scene. Will she reconnect with Erika or explore a new path with the mysterious student council president?
game.shortDescriptionEn: After breaking up with Erika, Bianca's life unravels once more when a second magic camera appears and a new girl, Lúcia, enters the scene. Will she reconnect with Erika or explore a new path with the mysterious student council president?
